Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Waldorf Hilton places you in the heart of London, steps from Lyceum Theatre and King's College London. This 5-star hotel is close to Trafalgar Square and London Eye.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 298 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 7 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at The Waldorf Hilton places you in the heart of London, steps from Lyceum Theatre and King's College London. This 5-star hotel is close to Trafalgar Square and London Eye.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lyceum Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
King's College London - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Theatre Royal Drury Lane - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
London Transport Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Covent Garden - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Opera House - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
London School of Economics and Political Science - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Somerset House - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Covent Garden Market - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
London St. Paul's Church - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Royal Courts of Justice - Law Courts - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Victoria Embankment Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Waterloo Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Two Temple Place - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cleopatra's Needle - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Waldorf Hilton is London (LCY-London City) - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
